title: Elements
description: Basic styles for html tags. This part contains no styles for classes, ids, or attributes. Elements part uses bits to construct rule sets. Elements contain foundational styles for larger parts.

sections.title: Headings
description: Headings styled using variables found in `_vars.scss`.

sections.title: Links & Paragraphs
description: Paragraph and anchor tags styled using variables found in `_vars.scss`.

sections.title: Lists
description: Lists styled using variables found in `_vars.scss`. Lists set up base styles for `03_collections/_listmods.scss`

sections.title: Forms
description: Forms styled using variables found in `_vars.scss`. Forms use utilities found in `_utils.scss`. Forms set up base styles for `03_collections/_formmods.scss`

sections.title: Tables
description: Tables styled using variables found in `_vars.scss`. Tables set up base styles for `03_collections/_tablemods.scss`
